text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to explain how Canadian competition law and import regulations affect exclusive distribution arrangements with foreign suppliers. The candidate answer mentions regulatory compliance (Section 6) covering Canadian standards, labelling, and product-specific rules (CFIA, Health Canada, WHMIS), and allocates responsibility for compliance, testing, and recalls. It also touches upon Incoterms and the Importer of Record (Section 5), which relates to import logistics.
